page.title: 19MY USUAL DAY
page.content: {My name is Emma Law and I go to {Wallace Fields First School. I get up at 7:00 AM and have my breakfast. After that I do my hair. At 8:40 we walk or drive to school. It takes a quarter of an hour to get to school if we walk. Sometimes I walk on my own. I play in the playground until the whistle blows and then I go into school and do my work. I have a packed lunch of sandwiches, biscuits, crisps and an apple. After lunch I go out to play. I pretend to run an exercise club. In the afternoon we make cakes, use clay or do origami. On Wednesdays we have a cake sale. Each cake costs 5p and you can only buy one. Miss Woodall reads us a story before we go home.
